languages.text: {n}Паскаль, подавшись вперед, пробегает пальцами по клавишам, и экран когитатора, мигнув, отвечает ему строками непонятных письмен.{/n} "Я обратился к духу машины с просьбой открыть также и личные архивы логиса Авеля. Он принял мой запрос".

{n}Pasqal leans forward and runs his fingers over the keys. The cogitator's screen blinks and responds with strings of unknown characters.{/n} "I appealed to the machine spirit to open Logis Abel's personal archives as well. It has accepted my request."
languages.original_text: {n}Паскаль, подавшись вперед, пробегает пальцами по клавишам, и экран когитатора, мигнув, отвечает ему строками непонятных письмен.{/n} "Я обратился к духу машины с просьбой открыть также и личные архивы логиса Авеля. Он принял мой запрос".

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal leans forward and runs his fingers over the keys. The cogitator screen blinks and responds with strings of unknown characters.{/n} "I have petitioned the machine spirit to open Logis Abel's personal archives as well. It accepted my request."

{n}Pasqal leans forward and runs his fingers over the keys. The cogitator screen blinks and responds with strings of unknown characters.{/n} "I have petitioned the machine spirit to open Logis Abel's personal archives as well. It accepted my request."

{n}Pasqal leans forward and runs his fingers over the keys. The cogitator's screen blinks and responds with strings of unknown characters.{/n} "I have beseeched the machine spirit to open Logis Abel's personal archives as well. It accepted my request."

{n}Pasqal leans forward and runs his fingers over the keys. The cogitator's screen blinks and responds with strings of unknown characters.{/n} "I have beseeched the machine spirit to open Logis Abel's personal archives as well. It accepted my request."

{n}Pasqal leans forward and runs his fingers over the keys. The cogitator's screen blinks and responds with strings of unknown characters.{/n} "I appealed to the machine spirit to open Logis Abel's personal archives as well. It has accepted my request."

{n}Pasqal leans forward and runs his fingers over the keys. The cogitator's screen blinks and responds with strings of unknown characters.{/n} "I appealed to the machine spirit to open Logis Abel's personal archives as well. It has accepted my request."

languages.text: {n}Pasqal beugt sich vor und lässt seine Finger über die Tasten fliegen. Der Bildschirm des Cogitators blinkt und antwortet mit einer Reihe unbekannter Zeichen.{/n} "Ich habe den Maschinengeist angefleht, auch die persönlichen Archive von Logis Abel zu öffnen. Er hat meine Anfrage bewilligt."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal leans forward and runs his fingers over the keys. The cogitator's screen blinks and responds with strings of unknown characters.{/n} "I appealed to the machine spirit to open Logis Abel's personal archives as well. It has accepted my request."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal beugt sich vor und lässt seine Finger über die Tasten fliegen. Der Bildschirm des Cogitators blinkt und antwortet mit einer Reihe unbekannter Zeichen.{/n} "Ich habe den Maschinengeist angefleht, auch die persönlichen Archive von Logis Abel zu öffnen. Er hat meine Anfrage bewilligt."

languages.text: {n}Pasqal se penche en avant et passe ses doigts sur les touches. L'écran du cogitateur clignote et répond avec des séries de caractères inconnus.{/n} « J'ai demandé à l'esprit de la machine d'ouvrir aussi les archives personnelles du logis Abel. Il a accepté. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal leans forward and runs his fingers over the keys. The cogitator's screen blinks and responds with strings of unknown characters.{/n} "I appealed to the machine spirit to open Logis Abel's personal archives as well. It has accepted my request."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal se penche en avant et passe ses doigts sur les touches. L'écran du cogitateur clignote et répond avec des séries de caractères inconnus.{/n} « J'ai supplié l'esprit de la machine d'ouvrir aussi les archives personnelles du logis Abel. Il a accédé à ma demande. »

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡身体前倾，手指在键盘上滑动。沉思者的屏幕闪烁着，以一串未知的字符作为回应。{/n}“我刚刚恳求机魂打开逻辑士亚伯的个人档案，它接受了我的请求。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal leans forward and runs his fingers over the keys. The cogitator's screen blinks and responds with strings of unknown characters.{/n} "I appealed to the machine spirit to open Logis Abel's personal archives as well. It has accepted my request."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡身体前倾，手指在键盘上滑动。思考器的屏幕闪烁着，以一串未知的字符作为回应。{/n}“我刚刚恳求机魂打开逻辑士亚伯的个人档案，它接受了我的请求。”

languages.text: {n}パスカルは身を乗り出して、キーに指を滑らせる。考算機の画面が点滅し、謎の文字列が応答した。{/n}「機械精霊に、論理学者アベルの個人アーカイブも開いて欲しいと頼み込んだ。幸い、機械精霊は要求を受け入れたよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal leans forward and runs his fingers over the keys. The cogitator's screen blinks and responds with strings of unknown characters.{/n} "I appealed to the machine spirit to open Logis Abel's personal archives as well. It has accepted my request."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは身を乗り出して、キーに指を滑らせる。考算機の画面が点滅し、謎の文字列が応答した。{/n}「機械精霊に、論理学者アベルの個人アーカイブも開いて欲しいと頼み込んだ。幸い、機械精霊は要求を受け入れてくたよ」

languages.text: {n}Pasqal se inclina hacia delante y pasa los dedos por las teclas. La pantalla del cogitador parpadea y responde con cadenas de caracteres desconocidos.{/n} «He rogado al espíritu máquina que abra también los archivos personales del Logos Abel. Ha aceptado mi petición».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal leans forward and runs his fingers over the keys. The cogitator's screen blinks and responds with strings of unknown characters.{/n} "I appealed to the machine spirit to open Logis Abel's personal archives as well. It has accepted my request."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal se inclina hacia delante y pasa los dedos por las teclas. La pantalla del cogitador parpadea y responde con cadenas de caracteres desconocidos.{/n} «He suplicado al espíritu máquina que abra también los archivos personales del Logos Abel. Ha aceptado mi petición».

languages.text: {n}Pasqal öne eğiliyor ve parmaklarını tuşların üzerinde gezdiriyor. Kavramsayarın ekranı açılıp kapanıyor, bilinmeyen karakter dizinlerinden oluşan bir yanıt ekranda beliriyor.{/n} "Makine ruhundan Logis Abel'in kişisel arşivini göstermesini de rica ettim. Ricamı kabul eyledi."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal leans forward and runs his fingers over the keys. The cogitator's screen blinks and responds with strings of unknown characters.{/n} "I appealed to the machine spirit to open Logis Abel's personal archives as well. It has accepted my request."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal öne eğiliyor ve parmaklarını anahtarların üzerinde gezdiriyor. Kavramsayarın ekranı açılıp kapanıyor, bilinmeyen karakter dizinlerinden oluşan bir yanıt ekranda beliriyor.{/n} "Makine ruhundan Logis Abel'in kişisel arşivini göstermesini de rica ettim. Ricamı hoş karşıladı."
